fac_detail:
FAC is the coin that is mined every day from the miner. For transaction purposes, you must convert the currency from the FAC wallet to the USDT wallet, and this is 1-way process
Current price of FAC: There are 5 stages of FAC appreciation, Phase1 is 0.01; Stage2: 0.015; Stage3: < strong>0.025 ; Stage4: 0.04; Stage5: 0.08 , each period is 90 days.

reward_1: Mining power increased by +5% (any machine purchased before or after, as long as it is in the FACTORY section, each machine will mine by 5% compared to the current one. For example: in the factory there is 1 machine 100, and 1 machine 500 bought in phase 1, then machine 100 mines 50FAC/day and machine 500 mines 500FAC/day, then when reaching the BUSINESS HOUSE level, then machine 100 will exploit 52, 5FAC/day and machine 500 will mine 525FAC/day)
